SCRIPT.MSCRI:
@echo off SET ERROR=0
!----------------------------------------------- Parameter validation --------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- : INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.LOGGING.HEADER.PARAM_VALIDATION
: SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Agent installer file" : SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER_VAL# = &UC4RB_PUP_MSI_FILE# : INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.LOGGING.PARAM
: SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Server Name" : SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER_VAL# = &UC4RB_PUP_MASTER_SERVER# : INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.LOGGING.PARAM
: SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Installation directory" : SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER_VAL# = &UC4RB_PUP_INSTALL_DIR# : INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.LOGGING.PARAM
: SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Puppet server hostname" : SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER_VAL# = &UC4RB_PUP_CA_SERVER# : INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.LOGGING.PARAM
: SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Certificate name" : SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER_VAL# = &UC4RB_PUP_CERT_NAME# : INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.LOGGING.PARAM
: SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Environment" : SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER_VAL# = &UC4RB_PUP_NODE_ENV# : INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.LOGGING.PARAM
: SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Startup mode" : SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER_VAL# = &UC4RB_PUP_STARTUP_MODE# : INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.LOGGING.PARAM
: SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Agent account user" : SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER_VAL# = &UC4RB_PUP_AGENT_USERNAME# : INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.LOGGING.PARAM
: SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Agent account domain" : SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER_VAL# = &UC4RB_PUP_AGENT_DOMAIN# : INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.LOGGING.PARAM
: INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.LOGGING.HEADER.EXECUTION
!------------------------------------------ Validation of file----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
! Agent installer file : SET &UC4RB_PUP_ESCAPED_STRING# = &UC4RB_PUP_MSI_FILE# : INC PCK.AUTOMIC_PUPPET_PUPPET.PUB.INCLUDE.ESCAPE_ARG_VALUE : SET &INSTALLER_FILE# = &UC4RB_PUP_ESCAPED_STRING#
: SET &FILE_PATH# = &INSTALLER_FILE# : INC PCK.AUTOMIC_PUPPET_PUPPET.PUB.INCLUDE.CHECK_FILE_DIR_EXIST
! Installation directory : SET &INSTALLATION_DIR# = "" : IF &UC4RB_PUP_INSTALL_DIR# <> "" : SET &UC4RB_PUP_ESCAPED_STRING# = &UC4RB_PUP_INSTALL_DIR# : INC PCK.AUTOMIC_PUPPET_PUPPET.PUB.INCLUDE.ESCAPE_ARG_VALUE : SET &INSTALLATION_DIR# = &UC4RB_PUP_ESCAPED_STRING#
: SET &FILE_PATH# = &INSTALLATION_DIR# : INC PCK.AUTOMIC_PUPPET_PUPPET.PUB.INCLUDE.CHECK_FILE_DIR_EXIST : ENDIF
!------------------changing the directory to agent's temp directory------------------------------------------------
: SET &AGENT_TEMPDIR# = GET_VAR('UC_EX_PATH_TEMP', &AGENT#) cd /d "&AGENT_TEMPDIR#" : SET &RESULT_TEMPFILE# = STR_CAT(&AGENT_TEMPDIR#,'installagent-&$RUNID#.txt')
!------------------------------------------ Buidling Install puppet agent command -------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
: SET &UC4RB_PUP_CMD# = "msiexec /qn /norestart /i &INSTALLER_FILE#"
! Installation directory : IF &INSTALLATION_DIR# <> "" : SET &UC4RB_PUP_CMD# = STR_CAT(&UC4RB_PUP_CMD#, " INSTALLDIR=&INSTALLATION_DIR#") : ENDIF
! Server Name : SET &UC4RB_PUP_ESCAPED_STRING# = &UC4RB_PUP_MASTER_SERVER# : INC PCK.AUTOMIC_PUPPET_PUPPET.PUB.INCLUDE.ESCAPE_ARG_VALUE : SET &UC4RB_PUP_CMD# = STR_CAT(&UC4RB_PUP_CMD#, " PUPPET_MASTER_SERVER=&UC4RB_PUP_ESCAPED_STRING#")
! Puppet server hostname : IF &UC4RB_PUP_CA_SERVER# <> "" : SET &UC4RB_PUP_ESCAPED_STRING# = &UC4RB_PUP_CA_SERVER# : INC PCK.AUTOMIC_PUPPET_PUPPET.PUB.INCLUDE.ESCAPE_ARG_VALUE : SET &UC4RB_PUP_CMD# = STR_CAT(&UC4RB_PUP_CMD#, " PUPPET_CA_SERVER=&UC4RB_PUP_ESCAPED_STRING#") : ENDIF
! Certificate name : IF &UC4RB_PUP_CERT_NAME# <> "" : SET &UC4RB_PUP_ESCAPED_STRING# = &UC4RB_PUP_CERT_NAME# : INC PCK.AUTOMIC_PUPPET_PUPPET.PUB.INCLUDE.ESCAPE_ARG_VALUE : SET &UC4RB_PUP_CMD# = STR_CAT(&UC4RB_PUP_CMD#, " PUPPET_AGENT_CERTNAME=&UC4RB_PUP_ESCAPED_STRING#") : ENDIF
! Environment : IF &UC4RB_PUP_NODE_ENV# <> "" : SET &UC4RB_PUP_ESCAPED_STRING# = &UC4RB_PUP_NODE_ENV# : INC PCK.AUTOMIC_PUPPET_PUPPET.PUB.INCLUDE.ESCAPE_ARG_VALUE : SET &UC4RB_PUP_CMD# = STR_CAT(&UC4RB_PUP_CMD#, " PUPPET_AGENT_ENVIRONMENT=&UC4RB_PUP_ESCAPED_STRING#") : ENDIF
! Startup mode : SET &UC4RB_PUP_CMD# = STR_CAT(&UC4RB_PUP_CMD#, " PUPPET_AGENT_STARTUP_MODE=&UC4RB_PUP_STARTUP_MODE#")
! Agent account user : IF &UC4RB_PUP_AGENT_USERNAME# <> "" : SET &UC4RB_PUP_ESCAPED_STRING# = &UC4RB_PUP_AGENT_USERNAME# : INC PCK.AUTOMIC_PUPPET_PUPPET.PUB.INCLUDE.ESCAPE_ARG_VALUE : SET &UC4RB_PUP_CMD# = STR_CAT(&UC4RB_PUP_CMD#, " PUPPET_AGENT_ACCOUNT_USER=&UC4RB_PUP_ESCAPED_STRING#") : ENDIF
! Agent account domain : IF &UC4RB_PUP_AGENT_DOMAIN# <> "" : SET &UC4RB_PUP_ESCAPED_STRING# = &UC4RB_PUP_AGENT_DOMAIN# : INC PCK.AUTOMIC_PUPPET_PUPPET.PUB.INCLUDE.ESCAPE_ARG_VALUE : SET &UC4RB_PUP_CMD# = STR_CAT(&UC4RB_PUP_CMD#, " PUPPET_AGENT_ACCOUNT_DOMAIN=&UC4RB_PUP_ESCAPED_STRING#") : ENDIF
: PRINT &UC4RB_PUP_CMD#
! Agent account password : IF &UC4RB_PUP_AGENT_PASSWORD# <> "" : INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.ATTACH : SET &UC4RB_ENCRYPTED_PASSWORD_TMP# = "&UC4RB_PUP_AGENT_PASSWORD#" : INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.DECRYPT_PASSWORD : SET &UC4RB_PUP_CMD# = STR_CAT(&UC4RB_PUP_CMD#, " PUPPET_AGENT_ACCOUNT_PASSWORD=%UC4_DECRYPTED_PWD%") : ENDIF
echo UC4RB_PUP_LOG_FILE::=&RESULT_TEMPFILE# ! Invoking command &UC4RB_PUP_CMD# /l*v "&RESULT_TEMPFILE#"
IF %ERRORLEVEL% NEQ 0 ( echo "ERROR: Unable to install the puppet agent. Please check log file for more information." )
!------------------------------------------ Error Handling -------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- ! Status messages : SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_INFO# = "******** INSTALL AGENT WINDOWS ACTION EXECUTED SUCCESSFULLY ********" : SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_ERROR# = "******** INSTALL AGENT WINDOWS ACTION FAILED ********"
! Check error level : INC PCK.AUTOMIC_PUPPET_PUPPET.PUB.INCLUDE.CHECK_JOBSTATUS

POST_SCRIPT.OSCRI:
:SET &STATUS# = GET_UC_OBJECT_STATUS(,,"RETCODE")
:IF &STATUS# EQ 0 : SET &HND# = PREP_PROCESS_REPORT("JOBS",, "REP","UC4RB_PUP_LOG_FILE*","COL=DELIMITER", 'DELIMITER=*::=*') : PROCESS &HND# : SET &KEY# = GET_PROCESS_LINE(&HND#,1) : SET &VALUE# = GET_PROCESS_LINE(&HND#,2) : IF &KEY# = "UC4RB_PUP_LOG_FILE" : SET &UC4RB_PUP_LOG_FILE# = "&VALUE#" : PUBLISH &UC4RB_PUP_LOG_FILE#,,"WORKFLOW" : TERM_PROCESS : ENDIF : ENDPROCESS : CLOSE_PROCESS &HND# :ELSE : SET &UC4RB_PUP_LOG_FILE# = "" : PUBLISH &UC4RB_PUP_LOG_FILE#,,"WORKFLOW" :ENDIF
